text: @morningmika @gtconway3d 1,000 Americans die each day from COVID-19 but Trump and his idiotic son-in-law, Jared Kushner, have “moved on” from the pandemic after having declared victory 50,000 deaths ago! Shameful how COVID-19 has been politicized and Dr. Fauci silenced!
